Primary Source(s): Statistics Canada Labour Force Survey – Alberta
Statistics Canada Consumer Price Index – Alberta
Provincial economic accounts (StatsCan) or Alberta Treasury Board & Finance reports
External Link(s): Govt of Alberta economic dashboard: https://economicdashboard.alberta.ca StatsCan GDP by province: https://www150.statcan.gc.ca/t1/tbl1/en/tv.action?pid=3610022201

Primary Source(s): Historical WTI crude oil prices (EIA, Bank of Canada)
External Link(s): U.S. EIA WTI series: https://www.eia.gov/dnav/pet/pet_pri_spt_s1_d.htm Bank of Canada market data: https://www.bankofcanada.ca/rates/price-indexes/commodity-prices

Primary Source(s): Bank of Canada – daily/monthly USD–CAD rates
Statistics Canada population estimates for Calgary/Edmonton (CMAs)
Statistics Canada Census – median household income by geography
Travel Alberta / municipal tourism stats (visitation, hotel occupancy)
External Link(s): Travel Alberta research & insights: https://industry.travelalberta.com/research Example visitation trends: https://industry.travelalberta.com/research/reports

Primary Source(s): Google Trends search interest for title/story keywords
CADAC, Canada Council, or arts-sector research reports (compiled into index)
External Link(s): CADAC (Canadian Arts Data): https://www.thecadac.ca Canada Council research: https://canadacouncil.ca/research
